Posts.Content: floridasurvivor47 wrote: I was diagnosed with stage 3a. I am a African American single mother. I have days where this really hits me. I was diagnosed in 2005. I had a modified mastectomy. I really hate the when people look at my chest when I tell them I had  Breast Cancer. My son is 10 now he was eight when this mess went down. I just needed to talk a little I guess. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tryuing to be brave floridasurvivor47 Fitztwins
